QuestData.Title: First Test Race: 2 Laps
QuestData.Description: Run through the arch...$BGet to the blue marker...$BGet to the green marker...$BGet to the red marker$BThen do it all again. That's right - 2 laps!$B$BGood luck!
QuestData.LogDescription: Run through the arch, hit the blue marker, then the green marker, the red marker, the purple marker, then return to the Ironelf games camp.

Objectives.Objective: Enter the Start Banner with a Darkmoon Game Token
